title: Ep. 440: What Scientists Learned from the Beauty Behaviors of 93,158 People & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 440: What Scientists Learned from the Beauty Behaviors of 93,158 People & The Week’s Beauty News
description:
Jess’s co-working space smells like Le Labo, Jenn tried a “body-remodeling” treatment, and evolutionary scientists learned some fascinating things about why humans beautify themselves (e.g., apply makeup, bathe, etc.) from a huge global survey. We’re also talking about the viral post from a hair stylist who was fed up with know-it-all clients; a stinky perfume factory in Florida; Danessa Myricks's genius Blurring Balm Powder; the Beauty of Joseon sunscreen worth the hype; and The Best Pencil from Jones Road. Plus: Have you heard? Brad Pitt and Travis Barker launched skincare lines.

  • Products & people mentioned on Ep. 440: https://shopmy.us/collections/75145
